import { useState } from "react" import { BrowserRouter, Route, Router, Routes } from "react-router-dom" import "./App.css" import AboutLinkIcon from "./components/AboutLinkIcon" import FeedbackForm from "./components/FeedbackForm" import FeedbackList from "./components/FeedbackList" import FeedbackStats from "./components/FeedbackStats" import Header from "./components/Header" import { FeedbackProvider } from "./context/FeedbackContext" import FeedbackData from "./data/FeedbackData" import AboutPage from "./pages/AboutPage" function App() { const [feedback, setFeedback] = useState(FeedbackData) return ( <>
} > } />
) } export default App
